title.@value: Special all-terrain vehicle as mode of transport of person injured in transport related event

definition.@value: A vehicle designed primarily for off-road use with capability to traverse a wide range of types of terrain by means of wheels, tracks, support on a cushion of air or other form of support/traction.

label.@value: Special all-terrain vehicle as mode of transport of person injured in transport related event
Mode of transport, Special all-terrain or off-road vehicle
